Key Match Events: Bangladesh's shaky start after Shakib Al Hasan's lbw decision led to a Pakistan collapse
Taskin Ahmed's impressive bowling performance with the new ball
Pre-Game Insights: The match was effectively a quarter-final for Pakistan
Pakistan's win kept their T20 World Cup dream alive
The Netherlands' upset over South Africa affected Pakistan's path to the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Pakistan's first win in the Super 12 stage of the T20 World Cup
